basic.blooming: Flowering period in spring and summer, fruiting period August-September
basic.color: Flower color white, with a golden yellow stripe in the leaf center, green on the edge

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Take more sunlight during spring and autumn, put in places with scattered light in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
